item.description:
please join us for a

SPOOKTACULAR HOWL-O-WEEN PARTY

October 31st, 3-4:30 pm

Prizes for: Most Original, Best Couple/Pack, Scariest

Seasonal refreshments and food

Fun games and doggie goodies!

Gory Details:

We may be outside so dress warm.

The health and safety of our furry friends is our top priority. Please be sure that your doggie(s) are current on their vaccinations including bordatella, DHLPP and rabies.

Dogs must be 20lbs or less and must be spayed or neutered

We reserve the right to ask a dog to leave who may be too aggressive or appears sick.

We ask that owners pick up after their own dog.

This event is free of charge but donations will be accepted.

Questions? Contact Emily at emily@offtheleashddc.com

group.name: The North Attleboro Small Breed Dogs Meetup Group

item.name: Howl-o-ween Party and Costume Contest!
